name: Mountain Gale
description: You hurl giant chunks of ice at the target. Make a ranged attack, dealing 4d4 + MOVE ice damage on a hit. On a hit, the target must succeed a CON save against your Move DC or flinch.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
